The Queen is a 2006 British fictional drama film depicting the British Royal Family
's response to the death of Diana, Princess of Wales on 31 August 1997. The film 
was directed by Stephen Frears, written by Peter Morgan, and starred Helen 
Mirren in the title role of HM Queen Elizabeth II.
